alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 25 at 1:58PM MDT until July 26 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING AND AGAIN ON WEDNESDAY... .Gusty southwest winds with very low relative humidity will continue through early this evening across Southwest Idaho, especially near the Nevada border, before subsiding overnight. Southwest winds will become gusty once again Wednesday afternoon and early evening with very low relative humidity. The dry and windy combination will result in critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 426... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM to 9 PM MDT Wednesday. * WINDS...West to southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...8 to 15 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
